name: Trademania
body:
Say you want to trade with someone? Say you two have busy schedules and want to leave it to the buyers convenience, or even setup something like a mini-mart...

Look no further! With the Sanscorp ltd. TradeMania-matic, stuff selling becomes a doddle!

This will allow you to setup trades for either a specific person(s), or just anybody with the right currency!

Check back often as this is very much a WIP project!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
